synthesis_conditions.description: To prepare 1−3, [(2-acetylthiomethyl-3-acetamido)phenoxy]acetic acid and other corresponding acids were combined with meso-α,α,α,α-tetrakis(o-aminophenyl)porphyrin, and then complexes 1−3 were synthesized according to the same procedure as used for SR in a previous report.

synthesis_conditions.reference: Refer to the synthesis procedure detailed in a previous report as mentioned for the preparation of complexes 1-3.
